name: Wrong Color
description: In This Super Fun Yet VERY Hard Puzzle Game, You Must Look At The Board With Colored Squares In front Of You. You Must Memorize The Color Pattern Of The Squares, Then Walk Out Through The Door. Doing So, There Will Be Larger Colored Squares That You Must Walk On To Get To The Other Side. But Only 1 Color Path/Pattern Is Correct, The Color Path You Just Memorized! If You Walk On The Wrong Color, You Will Be Reset To The Beginning Of The Level!
